title: Connection Issues?
body: Has anyone else had bad connection or connection just dropping?

replies.body: Connection issues are pretty common, since League is always online.  If your games are dropping, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to check for any blocks or instability while reaching our services.  Let me know if you have any questions!

How bad is it going to effect m, 2 of my 3 games I tried to play today I got disconected from. I am pretty sure I got reported for afk both games, and though my internet connection did cost my team the game, it was still somthing out of my controle.

It's very likely that it's going to get worse without troubleshooting, and will continue to degrade.  I don't advise queuing up for anymore matchmade games for now, and test it out in customs instead.
